clientsServed.workDescription: 2 years of agile development. Work closely with Designers and Backend developers to create new features. Helped upgrade codebase to be ES6 and Typescript as well as upgraded JQuery to v3.
Worked under Senior Developer to deliver a pixel-perfect redesign of the website. Created reusable UI components including Product Card and Instagram feature.
Re-themed existing websites. Involed working with lots of legacy code, contributing to the product while maintaining the standards of the code.
Used Javascript to create realtime data reporting dashboard. Scrubbed data from 6 different API sources, migrated to SQL Database, and outputted to Google Data Studio.

personal-projects.name: Online Store
personal-projects.description: Used React/Apollo to make GraphQL Queries and Mutations to a Prisma Database.

personal-projects.name: Productivity App
personal-projects.description: Keep track of your time. Following Pomodoro Method, users can time themselves in completing tasks and see how they perform each week.

personal-projects.name: Would You Rather Game
personal-projects.description: Answer questions submitted by other users. Add your own questions for others to answer. Used React/Redux.
